article_title: IDF says it is investigating Hamas claims baby hostage was killed.
sentence: IDF  says  it  is  investigating  Hamas  claims  baby  hostage  was  killed.

article_title: IDF says it is investigating Hamas claims baby hostage was killed.
sentence: Hamas  has  claimed  that  the  youngest  hostage,  10-month-old  child  Kfir  Bibas,  was  killed  along  with  his  4-year-old  brother  and  their  mother  in  an  earlier  Israeli  bombardment  of  Gaza.
